participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.background: I like to play soccer. I have a little sister. My favorite book is Pride and Prejudice. I have a golden retriever. My favorite subject in school is math.

participant_2.name: Taylor
participant_2.background: I do not like to eat meat. I like fruit. My favorite fruit is apple. I like green apples. I like to eat the skin of the apple.

content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1. I like to play soccer, I have a little sister, my favorite book is Pride and Prejudice, I have a golden retriever, and my favorite subject in school is math.
Hi, my name is participant_2. I don't like to eat meat, I like fruit, my favorite fruit is apple, I like green apples, and I like to eat the skin of the apple.
That's interesting, I like apples too. I like to eat them with peanut butter.
I've never tried apples with peanut butter. I'll have to give it a try.
You should, it's delicious. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, I like to go for walks, and I like to play video games.
I like to read too, but I don't like video games. I like to go for walks too, but I don't like to do it alone.
I know what you mean, I like to go for walks with my friends.
Me too. So, what are you doing this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. What are you doing?
I'm not sure either. Maybe we could hang out?
That would be fun. I'm free on Saturday.
Great, me too. What do you want to do?
We could go for a walk in the park.
That sounds like a great idea. I love the park.
Me too. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
So, what time do you want to meet?
